attributes.action: Allow the American  President, Donald Trump, to enter the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details:
Donald Trump was ELECTED democratically as the American President and there is nothing wrong there. If some people knew how elections work we would not be having this problem. The United Kingdom has got a legislation that states "Everyone has the right to freedom of expression", the Human Rights Act 1998, Article 10.
Can be read in full:
http://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/1998/42/schedule/1/part/I/chapter/9
attributes.background: If Freedom of Speech truly means something to you, you will sign this petition.The United Kingdom should listen and respectfully let the American President enter this country, any opinion should be heard even if somebody might not like it.
